description: Erection of a timber bike shed to front garden.  And installation of air condition unit at roof level.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-1a2ed655-7fff-926f-798f-4b1b5c741a17"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed bike store, by reason of its scale, design, position and character would result in an incongruous and incompatible form of development which would fail to respect the character and appearance of the subject property and would fail to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the <span id="docs-internal-guid-da1b1f45-7fff-248c-3879-7132256f98f8"><span style="font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Graham Road &amp; Mapledene </span></span>Conservation Area and would result in less than substantial harm. As such the proposed development is contrary to policies </span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">LP1 (</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Design </span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Quality and Local Character</span><span style="font-size:9pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">)</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">, LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets), policies (D4 Delivering good design) and HC1 (Heritage</span><span style="font-size:13pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"> </span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">conservation and growth</span><span style="font-size:13pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">)</span><span style="font-size:13.999999999999998pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"> </span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">of the London Plan 2021 </span><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">and the guidance contained within Hackney Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009, NPPF (Paragraphs 134) and the aspirations of the Graham Road and Mapledene Conservation Area Appraisal 1997.   </span></p>

<p>The proposed air conditioning unit, by reason of its location at roof level, would be an incongruous addition that would add clutter to the roof and the terrace it forms part of.&nbsp; As such, the proposal is contrary to policy LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan LP33, policies D4 (Delivering good design) and <span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">HC1</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> (</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Heritage conservation and growth)&nbsp;of the London Plan 2021 and would be contrary to the aspirations of the </span>Graham Road &amp; Mapledene Conservation Area Appraisal 1997.</p><div><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 13pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div>

<p>The proposed air conditioning unit by reason of its location <span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(32, 33, 36); font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">without&nbsp;an acoustic assessment to demonstrate otherwise, it would result in noise and disturbance </span>contrary LP2 (Development and Amenity) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a725b0ef-7fff-73a6-b45c-badca73949ac"></span><br></p>
